text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Licensed audiologist" means an individual who is licensed to practice audiology under Title 2 of the Health Occupations Article.
"Loan Bank" means the Hearing Aid Loan Bank.

"Otolaryngologist" means an individual who:
Is licensed to practice medicine under Title 14 of the Health Occupations Article; and
Specializes in otolaryngology.
"Program" means the Hearing Aid Loan Bank Program.
